organization.name: New Doggerland
organization.tax_status: pre-registration — not yet a registered charitable organization; not currently soliciting tax-deductible donations
organization.description: A long-horizon land project centered on dogs, people, and place. Developed as a permanent estate where rescue, work, rest, recreation, and shared life are intentionally held together. Governed by explicit ethical constraints, public accountability, and operational transparency.

donor_funds_control_constraint.fact: The DAF overview states that no individual can unilaterally control donor funds.

citations.ref: 05 external assurance/05.20 DAF Safety & Accountability Overview.tex
citations.quoted_span: No individual can unilaterally control donor funds.

constraints: ND does not endorse, oppose, or campaign for political parties, candidates, or electoral committees.
ND does not accept donations that require public political alignment, political messaging, or political conditionality.
ND does not accept donations where the donor relationship would reasonably be interpreted as partisan sponsorship or political patronage.

citations.quoted_span: ND does not endorse, oppose, or campaign for political parties, candidates, or electoral committees.

examples: cash at an event within lawful limits and receipting rules
platform donations where donor chooses anonymity
DAF grants where the underlying donor is not disclosed and the sponsor is reputable
lane_a_anonymous_or_non_attributed.key_property: ND cannot be publicly tied to a partisan actor.

screen_triggers: any donation above a chosen threshold
any donation that includes naming, public recognition, press, signage, or a public announcement
any donation from an entity whose identity is inherently political

donor_fund_protections_signaled.fact: The External Summary claims concrete controls are active by default, including explicit donor-fund protections.

citations.quoted_span: Concrete controls already in operation… explicit donor-fund protections.
